dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1334 IS: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the percentage limitation on assets of real estate investment trusts which may be held in taxable REIT subsidiaries.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Tillis (for himself and Mr. Warnock) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the percentage limitation on assets of real estate investment trusts which may be held in taxable REIT subsidiaries.

section.header: Increase in percentage limitation on assets of REIT which may be taxable REIT subsidiaries

subsection.text: Section 856(c)(4)(B)(ii) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking 20 percent and inserting 25 percent.
The amendment made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2025.
